requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10, 64-bit Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 / AMD FX-8320 or superior
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1060-6GB or AMD Radeon Rx 580 or Intel ARC 580 or equivalent DirectX 11, 12 compatibile card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: for full HD and lowered video settings
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10, 64-bit Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-12700 / AMD RYZEN 7 7700X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060 or AMD Radeon Rx 6700 XT or Intel Arc 750 or equivalent DirectX 12 compatibile card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: for 4K

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics should be enough
  • Additional Notes: If you have a very potato PC and the game runs slowly on it, feel free to contact me so I can update this.

Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: FrogTel i3
  • Graphics: FrogVidia FTX 1000
  • Additional Notes: Actually don't use too many Frog stuff they kinda buggy
